full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS MDZAD PA GTZANG MDOS SDE LNGA BYA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I BTZAN MDOS AU RGYAN PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS MDZAD PA DANG, GZHAN YANG MKHA' BAS MDZAD PA'I ZUR 'DEBS BTZAN MDOS LA SOGS 'GA' ZHIG LA BYIN RLABS MED PA 'GA' ZHIG LA 'GUGS GZHUGS MED PA, LA LAR LAM STON DANG GSHEGS GSOL DANG BZLOG PAS MA YIN PAR, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SPYI DANG BYE BRAG KHA BSGYUR BTZAN MDOS KYI GZHI SLANGS KYANG @008B GZHAN YANG MKHAS PAS MDZAD PA'I BTZAN MDOS LA SOGS PA NAS, CHOS RJE'I MING CAN DGE DAR ZHES BYA BAS BSGRIGS PA BGYIS PA BYA'O, ,YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG DGE LEGS AUL TZI'I THU NANG SO CES PA 'DI PAS RTEN 'BREL BA'I SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI BDE BSKYED PHUN SUM TSOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm LEGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
